comment: No matter how they spin it. The likes of 'Facebook' and 'Twitter' are going the same way as 'My Space' they're in terminal decline. Hiring Nick Clegg will only speed up the process.

# ::snt No matter how they spin it. The likes of 'Facebook' and 'Twitter' are going the same way as 'My Space' they're in terminal decline. Hiring Nick Clegg will only speed up the process.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / regardless-91
            :ARG2 (t / thing
                  :manner-of (s / spin-03
                        :ARG0 (t2 / they)
                        :ARG1 (ii / it))))
      :snt2 (g / go-06
            :ARG0 (t3 / thing
                  :ARG1-of (r2 / resemble-01
                        :ARG2 (a / and
                              :op1 (p / publication
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Facebook"))
                              :op2 (p2 / publication
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Twitter")))))
            :ARG1 (w / way
                  :ARG1-of (s2 / same-01
                        :ARG2 (w2 / way
                              :manner-of (d / decline-01
                                    :ARG1 (s3 / space
                                          :poss (ii2 / i))
                                    :mod (t4 / terminal))))))
      :snt3 (s4 / speed-up-02
            :ARG0 (h / hire-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Nick"
                              :op2 "Clegg")))
            :ARG1 (p4 / process-02)
            :mod (o / only)))
